plays.text: Penalty to Mark Bell 2 minutes for Tripping Mikael Renberg

Penalty to Steve Poapst 2 minutes for Holding Shayne Corson
Penalty to Boris Mironov 2 minutes for Elbowing Alyn McCauley
Goal scored by Alexander Mogilny assisted by Darcy Tucker and Aki Berg
Penalty to Cory Cross 2 minutes for Holding Alex Zhamnov
Goal scored by Mats Sundin unassisted
Goal scored by Alex Zhamnov assisted by Kyle Calder and Tony Amonte
